hero_image.alt: Hero image for The Anatomy of a Smart Beverage Line: 10+ AI Predictive Maintenance Use Cases You Can Implement Today

image_prompt: A photorealistic, professional image for a blog post. A female maintenance manager of South Asian descent and a younger male technician of Hispanic descent are standing in a bright, clean, modern beverage bottling facility. They are looking together at a tablet the manager is holding, which displays colorful graphs and data visualizations. In the background, a stainless steel bottling line is visible but slightly out of focus. Both are wearing proper PPE: blue hair nets, clear safety glasses, and clean, light-colored plant uniforms. The overall mood is collaborative, high-tech, and professional. The image should have no text.
